items.question: What is Integrated Livestock Service Delivery (ILSD)?
items.answer: ILSD is a digital livestock service delivery platform that connects livestock farmers with certified artificial insemination (AI) technicians, veterinarians, and livestock specialists to improve access to timely, quality, and reliable livestock services across North Shewa, Ethiopia.

items.question: Who can use ILSD services?
items.answer: ILSD services are available to smallholder farmers, livestock cooperatives, youth and women livestock producers, and small to medium livestock enterprises such as dairy farms and fattening units.

items.question: What types of services does ILSD provide?
items.answer: ILSD provides artificial insemination and reproductive health services, veterinary diagnosis and treatment, vaccination and disease prevention, pregnancy diagnosis, livestock nutrition and breeding advisory services, and digital livestock record keeping.

items.question: How do farmers request a service?
items.answer: Farmers can request services through simple digital channels. Initially, ILSD supports basic phone and SMS-based access, with plans to expand to mobile and web-based service requests as the platform grows.

items.question: How are service providers selected?
items.answer: All service providers working with ILSD are verified and certified professionals, including AI technicians, veterinarians, and livestock specialists. ILSD follows standardized service protocols and regularly monitors service quality.

items.question: How do payments work?
items.answer: During the initial phase, farmers pay service providers directly in cash. As the platform develops, ILSD will gradually introduce digital and mobile payment options to improve convenience and transparency.

items.question: Where does ILSD operate?
items.answer: ILSD currently operates in North Shewa Zone, Amhara Region, starting from Debre Birhan and expanding to surrounding woredas and kebeles, including rural, peri-urban, and urban areas.

items.question: Is ILSD a government service?
items.answer: No. ILSD is a private digital service platform that works in collaboration with government livestock offices, cooperatives, and other stakeholders to complement and strengthen existing livestock service delivery systems.

who.title: Who We Are
who.paragraphShort: ILSD is a digital livestock service delivery platform connecting farmers with certified AI technicians, veterinarians, and livestock experts across North Shewa.
who.moreParagraph: We are a digital AgTech startup dedicated to transforming livestock management through technology. Our platform connects farmers with certified animal health and breeding professionals, providing fast, reliable, and affordable services.
who.overlayText: We focus on bridging the gap between rural communities and experienced veterinarians using mobile, web, and call-center-based solutions. Starting in the Addis Ababa–Debrebirhan corridor, our goal is to make essential livestock services easily accessible to every farmer, anytime they need it.

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.missionText: Our Mission is to empower farmers with quick and dependable access to animal health and breeding services by leveraging digital tools, skilled professionals, and smart agricultural systems.
mission.visionText: Our Vision is to build Ethiopia’s leading digital livestock service ecosystem—one that increases productivity, supports sustainable farming, and improves the livelihoods of millions of farmers across the country.
